channel.title: Rambling on NS News and Views
channel.description: Recent content in Rambling on NS News and Views

item.title: Presentation, Nerves and Videotape
item.description: Recently, I had the privileged of being asked to give a ‘show and tell’ style presentation, at the Firefly Developer’s Day, held at Radley College. In truth, I received this invitation with a mixture of pride and anxiety – visions springing to mind of the Michael Bay ‘meltdown’ during his presentation at CES 2014!

item.title: Good enough? Don’t answer that!
item.description: One of my favourite blog posts is “I’m a phony. Are you?” by Scott Hanselman. I was on holiday in France when I read this post, and it gave me a wonderful sense of relief - I highly encourage you to read it.
